title: Silver Verity
description: Rebecca faces new challenges (from pirates to wedding arrangements and meeting the "In-laws") with her fianc√© and her family's help. Realizing that the wedding is just the beginning of marriage, Rebecca and Hugh work very hard to grow together as they anxiously await their royal wedding. But first the pirate threat, which looms over all of Fairydom, must be dealt with. The royal fleets are sadly outnumbered. Dare they hope for a victorious outcome?
author: Lea Carter
